entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a centaur who used to work with Hagrid and the other centaurs, but now they are angry at him.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who works with Firenze and has a good relationship with the other centaurs.

entities.name: dumblodore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who Firenze used to work for.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Firenze have a good relationship, but the other centaurs are angry at Firenze.
The other centaurs are angry at Firenze because he went to work for Dumbledore.
